title: Ticket #1350: condor_kbdd uses invalid timer id in XInterface on failed connect to X
description:
Examine main_init() in /src/condor_kbdd/kbdd.cpp . Observe that id is passed, uninitialized into XInterface. If XInterface fails to connect to the X Server, it tries to reset that timer to 60 seconds, but fails as it has an invalid id. (If you're lucky. If you're unlucky, if sheer chance deals you a valid timer, but not necessarily the one you wanted.)

It looks like [15839] (ef3c7ff02ea0dff9dd7c42d1cf32350461a9ec06) broke things.

This is almost certainly the cause of #1337
